dropbox_file_added: A user added a file to Dropbox in a project
dropbox_file_removed: A user removed a file from Dropbox in a project
dropbox_file_updated: A user  updated a file in Dropbox in a project
dropbox_folder_created: A user created a folder in Dropbox in a project
dropbox_folder_selected: A user linked a Dropbox folder in a project
dropbox_node_authorized: A user authorized the Dropbox addon for a project
dropbox_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the Dropbox addon for a project
dropbox_node_deauthorized_no_user: Dropbox addon for a project deauthorized
